how can I view windows shared file in ub: I am using a base installaion
you mean in a shared network folder?
I dont have GUI toolkits prebuilt with gnome
you're talking about the sort you would access on windows as \\host\folder right?
in nautilus (the file browser) just type smb://host/folder into the location bar
I mean \\192.168.0.140 and you get a list of shared files
any software for that in GUI
so on ubuntu just open the file browser
you don't need an extra gui - the default file browser can do it
you just need to type smb://192.168.0.140 in the location bar
Do I need sth like samba for that or just installing nautilus will do ?
yes you need samba, but if you're using a fairly recent version of ubuntu it should already be installed
